name: Cave Swing!
description:
As a lonely green cube (yeah i know, original right), you need to escape the depths of the underground using your grappling hook. to reach the safe platform at the end of each section

Currently only has an Endless mode as a test for the game mechanic itself. There may be a few bugs which can be remedied by losing a life or swinging up from a point and reconnecting to it when in the light.

Controls:

A & D - Left and Right movement

Space - Attach to grapple point

E - Next level
